com.dukascopy.api
Interface INewsFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalendarFilter, NewsFilter
public interface INewsFilter

News filter definition - used for INewsMessage subscription.
Default implementations : NewsFilter & CalendarFilter

Nested Class Summary
static class INewsFilter.Country
          Countries
static class INewsFilter.Currency
          Currencies
static class INewsFilter.EventCategory
          Event Category contains an ID of the event category so that historical events can be linked

          Stock indicies regions - used for INewsFilter.StockIndex grouping
static class INewsFilter.MarketSector
          Market sectors
static class INewsFilter.NewsSource
          News sources
static class INewsFilter.Region
          Geo regions - used for INewsFilter.Country grouping
static class INewsFilter.StockIndex
          Stock indicies
static class INewsFilter.Type
          News types
